original_title: One Stormy Night with Fred Floaty
overview: Inflatable pool toy Fred Floaty, stuck in a travel-agency display window on a rainy night, dreams of traveling to faraway places. He imagines himself floating in a pool at a sunlit tropical resort. His sunglasses fall off and attract the attention of a passing shark as they sink, causing Fred to realize there are dangers in having one's wishes fulfilled.
title: One Stormy Night with Fred Floaty
